    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(Person observer)
        Adds observer to the tool.
        Parameters:
        observer - person observing the tool

      • getCondition

        public double getCondition()
        Returns condition of the tool
        Returns:
        double value the condition

      • isBroken

        public boolean isBroken()
        Returns information whether the tool is broken.
        Returns:
        boolean information if the tool is broken true if tool is broken false otherwise

      • repair

        public boolean repair()
        Replaces old tool with the new one. Only broken items can be replaced/repaired.
        Returns:
        boolean value if the tool was replaced

      • use

        public boolean use()
        Uses tool that can be used by only 1 person at a time. This method is overwritten for different cases.
        Returns:
        boolean value of whether the tool has been used true if tool was used false otherwise (tool is already used, tool is broken)

      • notifyAllObservers

        public void notifyAllObservers(java.lang.String whatToDo)
        Notifies all observers of the tool.
        Parameters:
        whatToDo - string message what to do

      • destroy

        public boolean destroy()
        Sets state of item to broken. Method can be called only on idle tool.
        Returns:
        boolean value whether the tool has been destroyed

      • nextRound

        public void nextRound()
        Cycles through time. Tool can be used only for one unit of time.
